title: My Artworks done by pen

embed.description: This album is really big! It's going to take us a bit to get your download ready for you. Enter your email and we will notify you when it's ready. Once ready, it will be available for up to 24 hours.

body:
This is my challenge for all of you guys,
Pen only, any skin
Only under 1 hour
I took (Roughly)
40 Min for Zed and Panth 
15 Min for iBlitzcrank

Gl!

replies.body:
Those are really good, especially considering it seems you're just using a regular ballpoint pen.

You should consider purchasing a nice brush pen.
I probably wont, i like ballpoint pen artworks :p
dat bic product placement in the last one
i just wanted to show what pen i used :p
